Play background animation Pause background animation At the Johns Hopkins Department of Computer Science, we take pride in maintaining strong connections with our alumni, who are doing great things both personally and professionally. It is through the support of alumni and friends that the department has been able to maintain our role as a world leader in computer science research and education. We encourage all alumni to stay connected and get involved. Get Involved Build Your Network Connect with Hopkins Engineering alumni and broaden your professional and personal networks. WSE Alumni Resources Join the CS LinkedIn Group OneHop (JHU Alumni Network) Stay Connected Connect with us on social media to hear about alumni events and news, and share the amazing things you’re doing and update your contact information today. Twitter Facebook Update Your Information Give Back Lend your time and talents to contribute to the future success of our students and programs. Volunteer with the Whiting School Support Our Mission As alumni, you know better than anyone that the Whiting School of Engineering sets the standard for excellence in engineering education and research nationwide—and we can’t do it without your support.
